text: Trouble in the Glen is a 1954 British comedy movie directed by Herbert Wilcox and was based on the 1950 novel of the same name by Maurice Welsh. It stars Margaret Lockwood, Orson Welles, Forrest Tucker, Victor McLaglen, John McCallum, Jack Watling, Eddie Byrne and was distributed by Republic Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1954 comedy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Herbert Wilcox
title: Trouble in the Glen
